headline: Hubbell Incorporated Prices Offering of Senior Notes Due 2035
summary: Shelton, CT, Oct. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hubbell Incorporated (NYSE: HUBB) (“Hubbell” or the “Company”) today announced that it has successfully priced an offering of $400 million aggregate principal amount of 4.80% senior notes maturing in 2035. The offering is expected to close on November 14, 2025, subject to customary closing conditions. Net proceeds from the offering, together with cash on hand, are expected to be used to redeem in full all of the Company’s outstanding 3.350% Senior N

headline: Hubbell Inc (HUBB) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Earnings Growth and Raised ...
summary: Hubbell Inc (HUBB) reports robust Q3 performance with double-digit earnings growth, increased cash flow, and an optimistic outlook for 2026.

raw.headline: Hubbell Inc (HUBB) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Earnings Growth and Raised ...

headline: Hubbell (HUBB) Net Margins Rise, Reinforcing Bullish Narrative Despite Slower Earnings Growth
summary: Hubbell (HUBB) posted earnings growth of 15.5% year-over-year, a solid result although slower than its five-year average of 21.3% per year. Net profit margins rose to 15.1%, up from last year’s 13.2%, highlighting an improving margin profile. With revenue and earnings forecasts set to trail the broader US market, investors are considering whether the continued profit gains and attractive valuation multiples justify the current price premium. See our full analysis for Hubbell. The next section...
